title: Installation issue: CMake using Intel compilers
body:
Using `spack@develop` (96fa6f0c1be4ab55ec6ba7cd5af059e1ed95351f, from 17-July-2020) at NERSC Cori on `haswell`:

Building `CMake@3.17.3` fails with:
1. `%intel@19.0.3.199` -- fails in boostrap phase (see below)
2. `%intel@19.1.1.217` -- fails in bootstrap phase (same error as 1.)
3. `%intel@18.0.3.222` -- fails during build (see below)


**%intel@19.0.3.199, %intel@19.1.1.217 -- bootstrap fails**
```
$> spack install cmake@3.17.3%intel@19.0.3.199
...
==> 21896: Installing cmake
...
==> No patches needed for cmake
==> 21896: cmake: Building cmake [Package]
==> 21896: cmake: Executing phase: 'bootstrap'
...
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 7:
    './bootstrap' '--prefix=/global/u1/l/eugenewalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.0.3.199/cmake-3.17.3-ajy6uihnh2s34y6uwnkagznxvygjb2rm' '--parallel=16' '--no-system-libs' '--no-qt-gui' '--' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release' '-DCMake_TEST_INSTALL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_USE_OPENSSL=True'
1 error found in build log:
     1    ==> 21896: cmake: Executing phase: 'bootstrap'
     2    ==> [2020-07-20-12:04:55.896236, 21967] './bootstrap' '--prefix=/global/u1/l/eugenewalker/spack/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placehold
          er/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeh
          older/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_pla
          ceholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_path_placeholder/spack_/cray-cnl7-haswell/intel-19.
          0.3.199/cmake-3.17.3-ajy6uihnh2s34y6uwnkagznxvygjb2rm' '--parallel=16' '--no-system-libs' '--no-qt-gui' '--' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release' '-DCMake_TEST_INSTAL
          L=OFF' '-DCMAKE_USE_OPENSSL=True'
     3    ---------------------------------------------
     4    CMake 3.17.3, Copyright 2000-2020 Kitware, Inc. and Contributors
     5    C compiler on this system is: /global/u1/l/eugenewalker/spack/lib/spack/env/intel/icc
     6    ---------------------------------------------
  >> 7    Error when bootstrapping CMake:
     8    Cannot find a C++ compiler that supports both C++11 and the specified C++ flags.
     9    Please specify one using environment variable CXX.
     10   The C++ flags are "".
     11   They can be changed using the environment variable CXXFLAGS.
     12   See cmake_bootstrap.log for compilers attempted.
     13   ---------------------------------------------
```

@becker33 @shahzebsiddiqui
